projects.title: URBAN DESIGN - HCU HAFEN CITY UNIVERSITAET HAMBURG
projects.description: Responsive website featuring filtering and infinite scroll functionalities for the Research & Teaching program at the Urban Design department of Hafencity University of Hamburg. The site is built with Next.js using the App Router, and it fetches data from endpoints provided by Kirby Headless CMS.

projects.title: International Architecture Biennale Rotterdam (IABR)
projects.description: Multilingual and responsive website featuring filtering and animations for the International Architecture Biennale in Rotterdam. The site is built with Next.js using the Pages Router, and it fetches data from endpoints provided by Kirby Headless CMS.

projects.title: Queer speed dating
projects.description: Responsive full-stack application designed as a fast and efficient tool for organizers of queer speed dating events. The application allows participants to enter their personal details, which are stored in a MongoDB database, and generates a dedicated page for each participant. Post-event, organizers log in to access the matchmaking functionality, input participant preferences, and generate lists of love and friend matches. Originally designed and built as a hobby project, it was utilized by the organizers of Linköping Pride 2024. The site is built with Next.js and React, utilizing NextAuth.js for authentication.

projects.title: francisca khamis Giacoman - portfolio
projects.description: Portfolio of performance and installation artist Francisca Khamis Giacoman. The site is responsive, multilingual, and built with Next.js using the Pages Router. It fetches data from endpoints provided by Kirby Headless CMS.

projects.title: Wunderbaum
projects.description: Multilingual and responsive website for the Dutch theater group, Wunderbaum

projects.title: Lukas Jüliger
projects.description: Portfolio of the illustrator and author Lukas Jüliger
